author: wsjcom
title: Flood-Insurance Debt: Blame Mother Nature
text:
Your editorial “The Swampland Republicans” (Jan. 17) depicts me and other Louisiana delegation members as obstructionists to making the National Flood Insurance Program (NFIP) more financially secure.
No one is more concerned about the economic health of the NFIP than I am. That’s why I gathered bipartisan support and co-authored the leading Senate bill that would cure many of the program’s ills. Second, I take offense at Louisiana’s depiction as a state populated with repeat flood offenders grazing on a trough of federal...
